app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/12/10/1062/s1, Figure S1: Phylogenetic analyse done with partial nucleoprotein (630 nt), including 45 sequences. Four sequences published in Bowen et al. 2000 were added to the main analysis to support four sub-lineages: Faranah, Kissidougou, Macenta and Nzérékoré, Table S1: List of patients and contacts tested for Ebola (EBOV) and Lassa (LASV) viruses.
